Package com.eventApp.Utils

Class ValidationUtils

java.lang.Object
com.eventApp.Utils.ValidationUtils
public class ValidationUtils extends Object
Utility class providing static methods for validating various inputs used throughout the system. Includes validations for names, emails, passwords, enrollment numbers, club names, descriptions, categories, event times, and dates.

  • Constructor Details

    • ValidationUtils

      public ValidationUtils()

  • Method Details

    • checkName

      public static void checkName(String name) throws ValidationException
      Validates that the given name contains only alphabetic letters and spaces. Throws ValidationException if the name is null, empty, or contains invalid characters.
      Parameters:
      name - the input name string to validate
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the validation fails

    • checkEmail

      public static void checkEmail(String email) throws ValidationException, SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Validates the given email string according to standard email format rules. Also checks for duplicate email entries in the system via UserDAO.
      Parameters:
      email - the email string to validate
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the email format is invalid or empty
      SQLException - if a database error occurs during duplication check
      ClassNotFoundException - if database driver is not found

    • checkPassword

      public static void checkPassword(String password) throws ValidationException
      Validates password strength according to defined criteria: minimum length of 8, at least one uppercase, one lowercase, one digit, and one special character.
      Parameters:
      password - the password string to validate
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if password does not meet the criteria

    • isMatchingPasswords

      public static void isMatchingPasswords(String password, String confirmPassword) throws ValidationException
      Checks if the given password and confirmation password match exactly.
      Parameters:
      password - original password
      confirmPassword - confirmation password to compare
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if passwords do not match

    • checkEnrollment

      public static void checkEnrollment(String enrollment) throws ValidationException, SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Validates enrollment number to ensure it is not empty and contains only alphanumeric characters. Also checks for duplicate enrollment number via UserDAO.
      Parameters:
      enrollment - enrollment number string to validate
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if invalid format or empty
      SQLException - if a database error occurs during duplication check
      ClassNotFoundException - if database driver is not found

    • checkClubName

      public static void checkClubName(String clubName) throws ValidationException
      Validates club name by checking if it already exists and ensuring it contains only letters and spaces.
      Parameters:
      clubName - the club name string to validate
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if validation fails

    • checkDescription

      public static void checkDescription(String description) throws ValidationException
      Validates that the given description is not null.
      Parameters:
      description - description string to validate
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if null

    • checkEventTime

      public static void checkEventTime(LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime) throws ValidationException
      Validates that an event's start time is strictly before its end time.
      Parameters:
      startTime - event start time
      endTime - event end time
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if start time is null, end time is null, or start time is not before end time

    • dateValidator

      public static void dateValidator(LocalDate inputDate) throws ValidationException
      Validates that the given date is not null and not in the past.
      Parameters:
      inputDate - the date to validate
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if date is null or before the current date
